metadata.title: Arsenal+ English Resource Pack
metadata.author: bamalf, KBA3u and mr_easy_money
metadata.description:
This mod contains the resources for the Arsenal+ game expansion. Must be loaded alongside the Arsenal+ English Data mod for Arsenal+ to work properly.
Adds weapons, drones, etc. assets from the FTL: Captain's Edition mod, found here: https://subsetgames.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=11&t=15663, improves graphics and much more. Not all the graphics assets(sprites, weapon art, etc.) were created by the makers of this mod: some assets from different mods from the official game forum are incorporated into this mod.
Captain's Edition's assets are correctly given credit; this can be found on this mod's official forum page.
